0: God be merciful unto us, and bless us; and cause his face to shine upon us; Selah.
1: That thy way may be known upon earth, thy saving health among all nations.
2: Let the people praise thee, O God; let all the people praise thee.
3: O let the nations be glad and sing for joy: for thou shalt judge the people righteously, and govern the nations upon earth. Selah.
4: Let the people praise thee, O God; let all the people praise thee.
5: Then shall the earth yield her increase; and God, even our own God, shall bless us.
6: God shall bless us; and all the ends of the earth shall fear him.
